# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Given its value and the benefits it provides, we're offering it to you at a special price of $9,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product worth $10,000 at a highly competitive rate. I believe this offer will be mutually beneficial, allowing you to maximize your investment while ensuring we receive a fair return for our efforts. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
